item.title: By: Geoff
item.dc:creator: Geoff
item.description:
Yeah, yeah... you try throwing up a site in less than five hours with no time for error checking, amidst packing, sorting out work details, seeing your girlfriend as much as possible because seven weeks away from her is going to kill you, and see how much you can focus on specific CSS problems.
Yeesh.
Jerk. ;)
(Just kiddin', Shannon...)
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, yeah… you try throwing up a site in less than five hours with no time for error checking, amidst packing, sorting out work details, seeing your girlfriend as much as possible because seven weeks away from her is going to kill you, and see how much you can focus on specific CSS problems.

Yeesh.

Jerk. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: trig33k
item.dc:creator: trig33k
item.description:
tsk, tsk, tsk...
Geoff, that was <em>classic amateur</em> mistake...have I taught you nothing during my time at CM?!?
Just kidding my friend...hope you guys are having a great trip. Your blogs are great.
Shannon
